content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"><ShortName>INTERNATIONAL HYDROGRAPHIC ORGANIZATION</ShortName><Description>The International Hydrographic Organization is an intergovernmental consultative and technical organization that was established in 1921 to support safety of navigation and the protection of the marine environment.</Description><InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding><Image type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon" width="16" height="16">http://www.iho.int/srv1/templates/PrimeBlue/favicon.ico</Image><Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="http://www.iho.int/srv1/index.php?option=com_search&format=opensearch&lang=en"/><Url type="text/html" template="http://www.iho.int/srv1/index.php?option=com_search&searchword={searchTerms}"/></OpenSearchDescription>
